entry.title: New release for UpSnap: 4.6.0
entry.content:
New Features

Device descriptions (https://github.com/seriousm4x/UpSnap/discussions/947)

Devices can now have a description to better identify them.

Auto open link (https://github.com/seriousm4x/UpSnap/discussions/847)

When waking up a device, you can now choose whether you want its link to open automatically. The link can open in a new tab, the same tab, or not at all‚Äîit's your choice.

Note: This feature is designed to open the link only if you manually click the wake button. Additionally, the link will open only in the specific browser session where the action is performed, not in others.

Changelog

Features

  • 973a1b80d0ec9c37bbcf3df9b1df39d220b5042a: feat: add device description field (@seriousm4x)
  • 0e427585131763300f8b82cd013d510af8c61d0d: feat: auto open device link after wake (@seriousm4x)

Bug fixes

  • 8906b2b6cea9ddefd156b7346a88cc58b42c8b89: fix: dependabot ignore major releases (@seriousm4x)
  • 8cb100552d2c3cd0521f5183b5d71e58d2370fc1: fix: grammar in shutdown description (@seriousm4x)

Others

  • 558e6484d09b4b249ed1e4c40d67744303d6c2fd: format (@seriousm4x)
  • c926eb792e9bda80a912b95abbea42122ebd9fbe: pnpm format (@seriousm4x)

Go dependencies

  • eea7ff492b6db7ba36664fbd3512e240fc5aa64d: go-dep: bump github.com/pocketbase/pocketbase in /backend (@dependabot[bot])
  • 567fa46e77e1f5a5d0700e4bb61fdb447d80d118: go-dep: bump github.com/prometheus-community/pro-bing in /backend (@dependabot[bot])

Npm dependencies

entry.title: New release for UpSnap: 5.0.0
entry.content:
üöÄ UpSnap 5.0.0

[!WARNING]
Important: Update Your Device Cron Expressions! All device cron expressions must be updated to follow the new 5-6 digit format, where the first digit (seconds) is optional. If not updated, cron may behave unexpectedly or stop working.

A new form validation will help you verify if your cron expression will work as expected:

‚≠ê Almost 3,000 GitHub stars! Thank you for your support! If you find Upsnap useful, consider giving it a ‚≠êÔ∏è!

This update brings new features, bug fixes and a smaller binary.

‚ú® What's New?

üé® UI & Styling

  • Updated to Svelte 5 for better performance
  • DaisyUI 5 and Tailwind 5 for improved styling
  • 3 New Themes for more customization (caramellatte, abyss, silk)

üîç Features & Improvements

  • Search Input for Devices to quickly find devices on your dashboard

üåç New Languages

  • Bahasa Indonesia üáÆüá©
  • Polish üáµüá±

üìâ Performance & Optimizations

  • 25% Smaller Binary Size with PocketBase 26.0
  • Switched to inlang/paraglide-js for translations

Changelog

Features

  • ce42d060ff51d5caf2d0bf2f7da078a260080088: feat: add <pre> tags for cron explaination (@seriousm4x)
  • 33c56016f64a6f088128d5c3d7bc2abcee24dcf2: feat: add keyboard shortcut to search bar (@seriousm4x)
  • c2f574426f629f8566e4f9cb520e66c047643526: feat: add more test cases (@seriousm4x)
  • 77147f04c1e4ca1098ed140a604a82d06805e298: feat: add search bar (@seriousm4x)
  • cbbd187214315a08addceeed91d32230ef4770bb: feat: bahasa indonesia translation (#1007) (@yogaardiansyah)
  • 2e64e85d4b5a857804790a2b320c98a427b3fc84: feat: custom timeouts for wake and shutdown (@seriousm4x)
  • b22ca4525ea1c5e665f08ead37e9ee5c47e105f1: feat: daisyUI 5, tailwind 4, design adjustments (@seriousm4x)
  • cee1669a0ea130822fd5613a9df70533a2d6664c: feat: improve cron syntax validation and force 6 digits with seconds (@seriousm4x)
  • 3dcc3fb64b461647ef8baf32632b5a1d5e69793c: feat: improve cross platform ping (@seriousm4x)
  • f53b93a3a544010596567628a16eeff57bb38255: feat: replace typesafe-i18n with inlang/paraglide-js (@seriousm4x)
  • f13e1270c1568dbe4c60816332183d21ec964e09: feat: search for mac address (@seriousm4x)
  • 59926b8c28c37d0d95c428cde6dae56ecfe56b5d: feat: validate cron with backend, show next cron date (@seriousm4x)

Bug fixes

  • 0eaff40b519150bdb4820253d39cb967618e97e3: fix: add search placeholder to pl (@seriousm4x)
  • b7811dbe27247a9cbb551b30ca435fa970484764: fix: better err msg formatting (@seriousm4x)
  • 40226c2984dab2e53e340d7455e2c65d598e1431: fix: change logger warning msg (@seriousm4x)
  • 3c0ec6310f3a9a38b99dc56d872adf102e3f9c9e: fix: dropdown on safari (@seriousm4x)
  • de4a46995ccf45f94175ab20f9370a689c82347a: fix: formatting (@seriousm4x)
  • 65be53bd3c32c2505847f557dbf0bc8bfd31ae81: fix: goreleaser deprecation warning (@seriousm4x)
  • e4a12c5d3c25bdd1b35c0046c41b23d1899d879f: fix: improve welcome screen logic (@seriousm4x)
  • 75d47fcd9c7742f507ba9f47f74b92fd79acf585: fix: indonesian emoji and date-fns #1007 (@seriousm4x)
  • 76c6797495dfc9530a6c6f5d8137cb622821a613: fix: keep description at top (@seriousm4x)
  • b779ca34a3d775d30e82b0d2241eacc224441d46: fix: localeCompare will use $localStore and sort numeric (@seriousm4x)
  • 543424a9780df67f880ca3c56941e845da7f5541: fix: make input a fieldset (@seriousm4x)

  • f410caaa54b48ce965a321d55337af8ff7b36745: fix: order button joint-item border (@seriousm4x)

  • 56e7c230b3ce0c5683b008fc6d1f897e4e3c7d32: fix: replace $page with new page store (@seriousm4x)

  • 88f69ee99bd197fbe4d751412bf67ae3d6e7a22f: fix: store order in localStorage (@seriousm4x)
  • 7b8947656a2a9cb930d9543b8663cd53922281ad: fix: trim inputs (@seriousm4x)
  • cbf8e8dcaba50bb3336207c25274675c7ff7bc8d: fix: ts type (@seriousm4x)
  • 169ecf57738e431ce30a20e5b10a94a4625dadba: fix: update components to comply with daiysUI v5 (@seriousm4x)
  • 604c7201e91cf970dc0cd513c582bf0bd2e4f63a: fix: use https url for packge (@seriousm4x)
  • 7d5cfff62f3bbbc26b8b59a821ce16de81888667: fix: use temp pr branch for svelte-french-toast (@seriousm4x)

Others
